biotools.summary: MONSTER takes a PDB structure file as input, and predicts non-bonding interactions that have the potential to provide stability to the molecule.  The output can be viewed or downloaded as XML or text, or can be viewed as a 3D structure or a 2D diagram.  There is also a good tutorial available at the site.

bioschemas.name: MONSTER
